casebody.data:
State
v.
William Miller Baker 35PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2016 Brendan O'Donnell, Attorney at Law, for Baker, William Miller. David Gordon, Assistant Attorney General, Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Jennifer Harjo, Attorney at Law, Wilmington.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of August 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of August 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 6th day of September 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
